actions.name: Covering Fire Action (#1)
actions.description: As a Complex Action costing 2PP, when wielding a Ranged Weapon, you may provide Covering Fire. Set up a Covering Fire Clock with 3 Spans. You and your allies may tick a span on this clock to claim Light Cover (or Heavy Cover if already in Light Cover) from incoming ranged attacks. The Covering Fire effect ends when either the clock is filled, or your next activation begins.
